entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:04 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 11:30 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -8
Wind: WSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow north of Cape Ray this evening. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
